tool.name: Get nonessential, LoF variants
tool.help:
usage: gNALI [-h] -i INPUT_FILE [-o OUTPUT_DIR] [-f]
Given a list of genes to test, gNALI finds all potential loss of function variants of those genes.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -i INPUT_FILE, --input_file INPUT_FILE File of genes to test. Accepted formats: csv, txt -o OUTPUT_DIR, --output_dir OUTPUT_DIR Name of output directory. Default: results-ID/ -f, --force Force existing output folder to be overwritten
